subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN3385, how did it go?
description_text:
I did not receive the items yet. Visvaldas
 
 
 
 On Wed, 3 Dec 2025 at 4:54 PM SIMSONN wrote: 
 Hello Visvaldas, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ Hello Visvaldas, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. Simsonn Plus X Racing Simulation Pedal with Haptic Reactor Optional Plus X P3-H3 / Black / without Baseplate Dislike it Love it! SIMSONN PC USB 6+R H Simulator Gear Shifter 6+R Dislike it Love it! Quick Release(QR) Dislike it Love it! Simsonn VAM Pro Linear Motor - the Pedals Haptic Reactor for Vibration Feedback VAM Pro Set (2 pac/includes power supply) Dislike it Love it! Unsubscribe

conversations.body_text: Hi Visvaldas Stonkus,    We apologize for the inconvenience. Your package appears to be undergoing customs clearance. We apologize for the delay.
